title: Cinder Elemental

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Generate (Red) each night.
- (Red)(X): Attack another player each night. The tier of the attack is equal to the amount of non-Red Mana spent on this ability, to a maximum of Overkill.

desc:
Post 1135
*Their rage can grow to such proportions that they explode in a cloud of fire.*
